description:
FX screened the first half of the pilot for its upcoming “Legion” series at New York Comic Con, giving “X-Men” fans their first taste of the eight-episode first season, set to premiere in early 2017.FX在纽约国际动漫展上表明了与Fox合作推出《一人军团》，使得《X战警》的粉丝首度看到了这部八集的电视剧将在2017年首播。

For the uninitiated, “Legion” is set in the “X-Men” world, following mental patient and mutant David Haller (Dan Stevens). “He doesn’t know what’s real, so you don’t necessarily know what’s real either,” showrunner Noah Hawley told the audience.对于门外汉来讲，《一人军团》是建立在《X战警》的基础上，是讲精神分裂病人变异的David Haller (Dan Stevens)。“他自己都不知道究竟什么是真实的所以大家也不必知道”主创Noah Hawley如是说。

The “Legion” cast also includes Aubrey Plaza (“Parks and Recreation”) as David’s batty friend Lenny and Rachel Keller (season 2 of “Fargo”) as Syd Barrett, a mysterious young woman David meets in the Clockwork Psychiatric Hospital.《一人军团》演员Aubrey Plaza饰演David的好朋友Lenny，Rachel Keller（《冰血暴》第二季）饰演Syd Barrett，与David相遇在Clockwork Psychiatric医院一个神秘的姑娘。
